original_text:
The wise will be put to shame;
    they will be dismayed and trapped.
Since they have rejected the word of the Lord,
    what kind of wisdom do they have?
korean_text: 지혜롭다 하는 자들은 부끄러움을 당하며 두려워 떨다가 잡히리라 보라 그들이 여호와의 말을 버렸으니 그들에게 무슨 지혜가 있으랴

sentences.original_text: The wise will be put to shame
they will be dismayed and trapped
Since they have rejected the word of the Lord
what kind of wisdom do they have
